doc:
Phoebe Waller-Bridge https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phoebe_Waller-Bridge 0 Phoebe Mary Waller-Bridge (born 14 July 1985) is an English actress, writer, playwright and director. She is best known for creating and starring in two sitcoms, Channel 4's Crashing and BBC Three's adaptation of Fleabag, as well as for writing and producing the BBC America drama Killing Eve, based on novels by Luke Jennings. Phoebe_Mary_Waller-Bridge ( born 14_July_1985 ) is an_English_actress , writer_,_playwright_and_director . She is_best_known for creating_and_starring in two_sitcoms , Channel_4_'s_Crashing_and_BBC_Three 's_adaptation of Fleabag , as_well_as for writing_and producing the_BBC_America_drama_Killing_Eve , based on novels by Luke_Jennings .
